name: Abattis Bioceuticals Corp.
description: Abattis Bioceuticals Corp. is a Canadian biotechnology company focused on the development and commercialization of innovative cannabis and health-related products. Established in 2013, Abattis has carved a niche in the burgeoning cannabis industry by leveraging its expertise in biopharmaceuticals and natural health products. The company aims to enhance the quality of life for individuals through the development of unique formulations and delivery systems that utilize cannabis and other natural ingredients. Abattis operates across various sectors, including health and wellness, with a keen focus on research and development to create proprietary products that meet the evolving needs of consumers. The company has established strategic partnerships with growers and labs to ensure high-quality production and compliance with regulatory standards. Abattis is also actively involved in the development of intellectual property related to cannabis extraction and formulation technologies, positioning itself as a leader in the health-focused cannabis market. With a commitment to sustainability and consumer health, Abattis Bioceuticals continues to innovate and expand its product offerings to cater to a diverse clientele seeking natural health solutions.

seo.meta_title: Abattis Bioceuticals Corp. | Innovating Cannabis and Health Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Abattis Bioceuticals Corp., a leader in cannabis biotechnology, dedicated to developing innovative health and wellness products to enhance quality of life.

faq.question: What products does Abattis offer?
faq.answer: Abattis offers a range of cannabis extracts, edibles, tinctures, and health supplements.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Abattis?
faq.answer: Mike Withrow is the CEO of Abattis Bioceuticals Corp.

faq.question: Where is Abattis headquartered?
faq.answer: Abattis is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.
